headline.main: KENT COUNTY, MD., HAS TERCENTENARY; Prof. Hall, British Minister, Links It in Spirit With Proud Kent of England SURE ABOUT DEMOCRACIES Monument to the Soldiers of Revolution Is Dedicated Before Throng

lead_paragraph: CHESTERTOWN, Md., Aug. 1 -Drawing parallels between the history and destiny of the Kent counties in the Old World and the New, Noel Hall, British diplomat, speaking tonight at the Kent County tercentenary celebration, warned the Axis that, though the democratic peoples of England and America might be "slow starters," they "get there in the end."
abstract: Prof N Hall lauds 4 freedoms and Atlantic Charter
